document_data.name: ''Bloodaxe''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Bloodaxe''''' was an enchanted [[battleaxe]] that was the personal weapon of the [[First Axe]] of [[Ruathym]], [[Rhaumon Bloodaxe]].
document_data.Description: This powerful axe had a ''+3'' enchantment. It's companion [[shield]] was the ''[[Redshield]]''.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1358 DR]], several [[undead]] beings, such as [[wight]]s, [[spectre]]s, and [[wraith]]s, watched over the final resting place of the First Axe of Ruathym, Rhaumon Bloodaxe. Patrolling the mansion to the northwest of Ruathym, they would attack intruders on sight, making it difficult for anyone to access the magical axe and shield that lay there.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Rhaumon Bloodaxe, First Axe of Ruathym
